message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
Come on, Alice. You won't find a better deal than this.
Bob, my turn to make a fair offer. Take it before inflation eats away at your share too!
You should have taken my previous offer, now I have the upper hand.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day!
You're running out of time, Alice. Take this before it's too late.
